About me

Nice to meet you, my name is Tyler Sprouse but I go by Houston. I'm a web developer and designer from Charlotte NC. I've worked jobs from retail to full on research and design.

I'm passionate about weightlifting, anime, nature, creating art, gaming, 3d modeling, and creating / finding cool and original websites.

I'm always ready to learn more about development and work with great people while doing so!
